var ViewBuilder = require('./ViewBuilder')
var User = require('./User')

var NATIVE_BRIDGE_NAME = "GetSocialCordova";

var UserListViewBuilder = function(onUserSelected, onCancel) {
    this.onUserSelected = onUserSelected;
    this.onCancel = onCancel;
}

UserListViewBuilder.prototype.show = function() {
  var option = this.toJson();

  var scope = this;
  cordova.exec(function(data) {
    if(data.isCancel) {
        scope.onCancel();
    } else {
        var user = new User(data.serializedUser)
        scope.onUserSelected(user);
    }
  }, null, NATIVE_BRIDGE_NAME, "createUserListView", [option]);
}

UserListViewBuilder.prototype.close = function() {
  var option = {}
  cordova.exec(null, null, NATIVE_BRIDGE_NAME, "closeUserListView", [option]);
}

UserListViewBuilder.prototype.__proto__ = ViewBuilder.prototype;

module.exports = UserListViewBuilder;
